Sentencas: Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cell (RSSOC) is a promising energy storage and conversion device with simplified cell configuration and enhanced reliability.
Titulo: A self-assembled hybrid electrode for reversible symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: However, the compromised activity of the electrodes in reducing and oxidizing atmospheres has restrained the overall performance of RSSOC.
Titulo: A self-assembled hybrid electrode for reversible symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In this study, a multi-functional oxide Sr2FeMo0.65Ni0.35O6-delta-Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-delta (SFMN-GDC) developed by a self-assembly method is investigated as the hybrid-electrode to enhance the performance of RSSOC for the first time.
Titulo: A self-assembled hybrid electrode for reversible symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The performance of the SFMN-GDC electrode is significantly enhanced with the homogeneous microstructure and extended TPBs length.
Titulo: A self-assembled hybrid electrode for reversible symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the in situ exsolved Fe-Ni alloy nanoparticle anchored on the SFMN skeleton can further enhance the electrode performance.
Titulo: A self-assembled hybrid electrode for reversible symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In SOFC mode operated with H-2, the RSSOC with the SFMN-GDC electrode shows a promising peak power density of 0.507 W.cm(-2) at 800 degrees C, while in SOEC mode with 50%CO2-50%H-2 at 1.5 V, a current density of 0.803 A.cm(-2) is obtained.
Titulo: A self-assembled hybrid electrode for reversible symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Most importantly, the RSSOC with SFMN-GDC electrode exhibits excellent stability and cycling reversible operation in both SOFC and SOEC modes for 215 h.
Titulo: A self-assembled hybrid electrode for reversible symmetrical solid oxide cells
